{{cpp/chrono/title|1=operator=={{small|(std::chrono::zoned_time)}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/zoned_time/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|chrono}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
template&lt; class Duration1, class Duration2, class TimeZonePtr &gt;
bool operator==( const std::chrono::zoned_time&lt;Duration1, TimeZonePtr&gt;&amp; x,
                 const std::chrono::zoned_time&lt;Duration2, TimeZonePtr&gt;&amp; y );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Compares the two {{tt|zoned_time}} values {{c|x}} and {{c|y}}. Two {{tt|zoned_time}} objects compare equal if their time points and time zone pointers both compare equal according to {{tt|1=operator==}}.

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

===Return value===
{{c|1=x.get_time_zone() == y.get_time_zone() &amp;&amp; x.get_sys_time() == y.get_sys_time()}}, except that the comparisons are performed on the nonstatic data members of {{c|x}} and {{c|y}} directly and no copying is performed.
